.
(bad)
.
<p>(bad)</p>
.


copyright
.
(c) (C)
.
<p>© ©</p>
.


escaped-copyright
.
(\c) (\C)
.
<p>(c) (C)</p>
.


reserved
.
(r) (R)
.
<p>® ®</p>
.


escaped-reserved
.
(\r) (\R)
.
<p>(r) (R)</p>
.


trademark
.
(tm) (TM)
.
<p>™ ™</p>
.


escaped-trademark
.
(\tm) (\TM)
.
<p>(tm) (TM)</p>
.


paragraph
.
(p) (P)
.
<p>§ §</p>
.


escaped-paragraph
.
(\p) (\P)
.
<p>(p) (P)</p>
.


plus-minus
.
+-5
.
<p>±5</p>
.


ellipsis
.
test.. test... test..... test?..... test!....
.
<p>test… test… test… test?.. test!..</p>
.


dupes
.
!!!!!! ???? ,,
.
<p>!!! ??? ,</p>
.


dashes
.
---remarkable --- super---

remarkable---awesome

abc ----
.
<p>—remarkable — super—</p>
<p>remarkable—awesome</p>
<p>abc ----</p>
.
.
--remarkable -- super--

remarkable--awesome
.
<p>–remarkable – super–</p>
<p>remarkable–awesome</p>
.
